AutoVariable.label: Autovote yes
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically votes yes depending on target status.

AutoVariable.label: Autovote no
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically votes no depending on target status.

AutoVariable.label: Autovote wait
AutoVariable.tooltip: Wait before we will automatically vote.

AutoVariable.label: Kick RAGE status
AutoVariable.tooltip: Votes no on RAGE status player call votes.

AutoVariable.label: Abandon on local vote
AutoVariable.tooltip: Abandon matchmaking server after calling vote.

AutoVariable.label: Requeue on kick
AutoVariable.tooltip: Requeue if getting kicked. Note: Queue will stop if vote fails.

AutoVariable.label: Rage Only
AutoVariable.tooltip: Only call a vote kick on RAGE status player.

AutoVariable.label: Prioritize Score
AutoVariable.tooltip: Prioritizes players with this amount of score.
